name: Ben Kay
description: i like to play golf, and i love horses, i worked with race horses for a few years. i am easy going, i try very hard not to judge others as one never knows what they may have had to deal with in there life. i love walking hand in hand with that special person in your life, that feeling of two being one, i have traveled some of the states and loved it and loved the people there, feel free to ask me anything pls
